REGISTER.PASSWORD_GUIDELINES: Password requirements: min. 8 characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
REGISTER.TITLE: Welcome!

REQUEST_PASSWORD_RESET.DESCRIPTION: Enter the email address you used to register and we'll email you the password reset instructions.
REQUEST_PASSWORD_RESET.TITLE: Forgot your password?

ERRORS.USER_STATE_NOT_ALLOWED: This account is not active, hence you cannot login. Contact your administrator.
ERRORS.RESET_TOKEN_INVALID: The link you are using is invalid.
ERRORS.RESET_TOKEN_EXPIRED: The link you are using is expired.

TOASTER.CHOOSE_PASSWORD: You can now login with your new password.
TOASTER.REQUEST_PASSWORD_RESET: An email with instructions was sent if it is linked to an account.

DELETE.CONTENT: Are you sure you want to delete this role? This may fail if the role is still in use.

ERRORS.ROLE_IN_USE: This role is still in use, hence it is not possible to delete it.
ERRORS.ROLE_NAME_ALREADY_IN_USE: A role with the given name already exists.

DESCRIPTION.ACTIVE: The user is able to login.
DESCRIPTION.INACTIVE: The user is not able to login.
DESCRIPTION.REGISTERING: An email has been sent to this user to activate his/her accound by choosing a password.

DEACTIVATE.CONTENT: Are you sure you want to deactivate this user? By doing this, the user will not be able to login anymore.

ERRORS.EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE: A user with the given email already exists.

ERRORS.GENERAL: Something went wrong. Please try again.
ERRORS.PERMISSION_DENIED: You do not have permissions to perform this action. Contact your administrator.

VALIDATION.FORM: The following input fields are not filled in (correctly): {{fields}}
VALIDATION.PASSWORD_UNSAFE: This password doesn't fit the requirements
VALIDATION.MAX_LENGTH: Value should have at least {{length}} characters
